countryCode.description: The country code of the profile

targetingType.description: Differentiates between a keyword-targeted and automatically targeted campaign

dailyBudget.description: Daily budget for the campaign in dollars

startDate.description: The date the campaign will go or went live as YYYYMMDD

endDate.description: The optional date the campaign will stop running as YYYYMMDD

premiumBidAdjustment.description: When enabled, Amazon will increase the default bid for your ads that are eligible to appear in this placement. See developer notes for more information.

placement.description: Ad placement. Only returned when segment is set to placement.

creationDate.description: The date the campaign was created as epoch time in milliseconds

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date the campaign was last updated as epoch time in milliseconds

servingStatus.description: The computed status, accounting for campaign out of budget, policy violations, etc. See developer notes for more information.
